home.title: Polimaks control center
home.subtitle: Keep warehouse stock and shop floor tasks in one clean dashboard.

inventoryCard.title: Warehouse flows
inventoryCard.body: Materials, waste, and finished goods in one place.

machinesCard.title: Machine room
machinesCard.body: Track printing, cutting, and lamination tasks.

home.cta: Pick a section from the sidebar to get started.

brigadaPage.title: Brigades / groups
brigadaPage.subtitle: Manage shift groups, people, and their leader. Data is local for now (TODO: connect API).

brigadaPage.leaderHint: Pick someone from the list as the leader.
brigadaPage.deleteHint: You can add it back later.

inventoryAnalytics.title: Inventory analytics

cards.valueHint: Sum of item values using stored prices.
cards.recordsHint: Total rows across all warehouse lists.
cards.avgRecordHint: Total value divided by total rows.
cards.topCategoryHint: Based on converted value in selected currency.

clients.title: Clients
clients.subtitle: Manage customers, their transactions, and tolling materials.

clientsPage.title: Clients
clientsPage.subtitle: Store client contacts, phone, company, and quick notes. Data is local for now.
clientsPage.deleteHint: You can add it back later.
clientsPage.complaintHint: Quickly jot down a complaint from this client.
clientsPage.planHint: Set limit for the current or future months. Past months are disabled.
clientsPage.planTodoBody: Order totals will be pulled from production/ERP later. For now, only the monthly limit is captured here.

clientsDetail.notFoundHint: The client does not exist in your local list.
clientsDetail.planTodo: TODO: show ordered kg for this month when API is ready.
clientsDetail.todoOrders: Future work: pull monthly order totals from production/ERP and compare against the limit.

clientsTransactionsPage.title: Transactions ledger
clientsTransactionsPage.subtitle: Track promises and payments from every client.
clientsTransactionsPage.caption: Each record stores the amount, currency, date, and notes.
clientsTransactionsPage.noClients: No clients yet. Please add one from the clients page.
clientsTransactionsPage.detailSubtitle: Balance, promises, and payments for this client.
clientsTransactionsPage.detailNoTransactions: This client has no recorded transactions yet.

stanokProfile.notFoundHint: This machine is not in the local list.
stanokProfile.infoBody: Track complaints and monthly kg limits for this press. Orders will be pulled from production later.
stanokProfile.planTodo: TODO: show actual ordered kg vs limit once API is ready.
stanokProfile.todoOrders: Future work: pull monthly order totals from production/ERP and compare against this limit.
